Question
========

In a study involving 30 subjects, the variable Blood Pressure is predicted based on Weight and Age. The square sum of the Regression is 285, the square sum of the residuals is 2400, and the total squared sum is 2685.

The muliple correlation (R) of this regression model is... 
Answerlist
----------
* 0.106
* 0.703
* 0.256
* 0.326

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
